entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Valemount
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:46 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow or rain. Temperature falling to zero this morning then steady.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow this morning. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. Temperature falling to zero this morning then steady. Wind chill minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 23. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 15. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 24. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023
